channel.title: Client help by ip
channel.description:
I have download a client and source i have code the client but 1 thing i dont know. I run the server and you need a username: password: ip: and port:(port auto fill in). Now my problem is the client ip: (stand auto no on my ip but this kill-djk.no-ip.biz) But my ip is purepkownz.no-ip.biz how to set my ip auto?
thanks from j3ss3tj3 and sorry for my bad english

I have a questin

I have got a new client but i can’t log into any of my avriot servers
y is that?

Read full topic

item.title: Client help by ip
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“j3ss3tj3, post:1, topic:278576”]I have download a client and source i have code the client but 1 thing i dont know.
I run the server and you need a username: password: ip: and port:(port auto fill in).
Now my problem is the client ip: (stand auto no on my ip but this kill-djk.no-ip.biz)
But my ip is purepkownz.no-ip.biz how to set my ip auto?

thanks from j3ss3tj3
and sorry for my bad english[/quote]
well I am guessing 317 sooooo… go into your client folder and look for the file client then look for “setserver” after that should be the ip with the port following just change that to yours and you should be good to go^^.(also check the “EGUI” or the “Gui” just incase)

Read full topic
